pageSetting.title: 虚拟行员绩效工资分配

attribute.value: select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ'
select coalesce(cast(css.csz as integer),0) as csrq from xtb_xtcs css where csmc='XNHYJZQSRQ'

select 1 from ( select b.jgkhdxdh,sum(zjx) as zjx from( SELECT cy.jgkhdxdh, sum (yyjg.yyjg) AS zjx from khfa_yyjg_hy yyjg inner join khfa_fapz pz on yyjg.fabh = pz.fabh and pz.yyzlbh = 1 inner join khdx_hy hy on yyjg.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and hy.hydh like 'XN%' inner join khdx_jgcy cy on hy.khdxdh = cy.khdxdh and yyjg.tjrq between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq where yyjg.tjrq in(select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER)) AND cy.jgkhdxdh IN(SELECT jgkhdxdh FROM KHDX_JGCY CY WHERE CY.KHDXDH=$khdxdh$ AND CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER) BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ ) group by cy.jgkhdxdh union all select cy.jgkhdxdh as jgkhdxdh,0 as zjx from khdx_jgcy cy where cy.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER) BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ )b group by b.jgkhdxdh )b inner join ( select a.jgkhdxdh,sum(a.fpjx) as fpjx from( select cy.jgkhdxdh as jgkhdxdh,$fpjx$ as fpjx from khdx_jgcy cy where cy.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER) BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ union all select b.jgkhdxdh,sum(a.fpjx) as fpjx from sgdr_xnhyfpjx a inner join khdx_jgcy b on a.khdxdh=b.khdxdh and a.tjrq between b.qsrq and b.jsrq where a.tjrq in(select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER)) and b.jgkhdxdh in(SELECT jgkhdxdh FROM KHDX_JGCY CY WHERE CY.KHDXDH=$khdxdh$ AND CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER) BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ) AND a.khdxdh!=$khdxdh$ group by b.jgkhdxdh )a group by a.jgkhdxdh )a on a.jgkhdxdh=b.jgkhdxdh where a.fpjx>b.zjx

select cast(sum(zjx) as decimal(19,2)) as zjx from (SELECT cy.jgkhdxdh, sum(yyjg.yyjg) AS zjx from khfa_yyjg_hy yyjg inner join khfa_fapz pz on yyjg.fabh = pz.fabh and pz.yyzlbh = 1 inner join khdx_hy hy on yyjg.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and hy.hydh like 'XN%' inner join khdx_jgcy cy on hy.khdxdh = cy.khdxdh and yyjg.tjrq between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq INNER JOIN csb_sjw sjw ON sjw.TJRQ= cast ('$tjrq$'||'01' AS integer) inner join xtb_xtcs css on css.csmc='XNHYJZQSRQ' where yyjg.TJRQ in (select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq<![CDATA[<=]]>(select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=cast('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER)) and ym=tjrq AND yyjg.TJRQ <![CDATA[>=]]>(CASE WHEN (select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ')='0' THEN (select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=cast('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER)) WHEN (select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ')='1' THEN (select nc from csb_sjw where tjrq=cast('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER)) WHEN (select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ')='2' THEN (select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=(select cast(css.csz as integer) from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJZQSRQ')) end)) AND cy.jgkhdxdh IN (SELECT jgkhdxdh FROM KHDX_JGCY CY inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.tjrq = CAST('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER) and sjw.ym BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ WHERE CY.KHDXDH = $khdxdh$) group by cy.jgkhdxdh union all select cy.jgkhdxdh as jgkhdxdh, 0 as zjx from khdx_jgcy cy inner join csb_sjw sjw2 on sjw2.tjrq = CAST('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER)and sjw2.ym BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ where cy.khdxdh = $khdxdh$) b group by b.jgkhdxdh

select coalesce(sum(a.fpjx), 0) as fpjx from sgdr_xnhyfpjx a inner join khdx_jgcy b on a.khdxdh = b.khdxdh and a.tjrq between b.qsrq and b.jsrq inner join xtb_xtcs css on css.csmc='XNHYJZQSRQ' where a.tjrq in (select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq<![CDATA[<=]]>(select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=cast('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER)) and ym=tjrq AND a.TJRQ <![CDATA[>=]]>(CASE WHEN (select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ')='0' THEN (select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=cast('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER)) WHEN (select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ')='1' THEN (select nc from csb_sjw where tjrq=cast('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER)) WHEN (select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ')='2' THEN (select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=(select cast(css.csz as integer) from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJZQSRQ')) end)) and b.jgkhdxdh in (SELECT jgkhdxdh FROM KHDX_JGCY CY inner join csb_sjw w on w.tjrq = CAST('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER) WHERE CY.KHDXDH = $khdxdh$ AND w.ym BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ) group by b.jgkhdxdh
select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ'
select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJZQSRQ'

select 1 from ( select b.jgkhdxdh,sum(zjx) as zjx from( SELECT cy.jgkhdxdh, sum (yyjg.yyjg) AS zjx from khfa_yyjg_hy yyjg inner join khfa_fapz pz on yyjg.fabh = pz.fabh and pz.yyzlbh = 1 inner join khdx_hy hy on yyjg.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and hy.hydh like 'XN%' inner join khdx_jgcy cy on hy.khdxdh = cy.khdxdh and yyjg.tjrq between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq where yyjg.tjrq in(select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER)) AND cy.jgkhdxdh IN(SELECT jgkhdxdh FROM KHDX_JGCY CY WHERE CY.KHDXDH=$khdxdh$ AND CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER) BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ ) group by cy.jgkhdxdh union all select cy.jgkhdxdh as jgkhdxdh,0 as zjx from khdx_jgcy cy where cy.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER) BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ )b group by b.jgkhdxdh )b inner join ( select a.jgkhdxdh,sum(a.fpjx) as fpjx from( select cy.jgkhdxdh as jgkhdxdh,$fpjx$ as fpjx from khdx_jgcy cy where cy.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER) BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ union all select b.jgkhdxdh,sum(a.fpjx) as fpjx from sgdr_xnhyfpjx a inner join khdx_jgcy b on a.khdxdh=b.khdxdh and a.tjrq between b.qsrq and b.jsrq where a.tjrq in(select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER)) and b.jgkhdxdh in(SELECT jgkhdxdh FROM KHDX_JGCY CY WHERE CY.KHDXDH=$khdxdh$ AND CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER) BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ) AND a.khdxdh!=$khdxdh$ group by b.jgkhdxdh )a group by a.jgkhdxdh )a on a.jgkhdxdh=b.jgkhdxdh where a.fpjx>b.zjx

select cast(sum(zjx) as decimal(19,2)) as zjx from (SELECT cy.jgkhdxdh, sum(yyjg.yyjg) AS zjx from khfa_yyjg_hy yyjg inner join khfa_fapz pz on yyjg.fabh = pz.fabh and pz.yyzlbh = 1 inner join khdx_hy hy on yyjg.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and hy.hydh like 'XN%' inner join khdx_jgcy cy on hy.khdxdh = cy.khdxdh and yyjg.tjrq between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq INNER JOIN csb_sjw sjw ON sjw.TJRQ= cast ('$tjrq$'||'01' AS integer) inner join xtb_xtcs css on css.csmc='XNHYJZQSRQ' where yyjg.TJRQ in (select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq<![CDATA[<=]]>(select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=cast('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER)) and ym=tjrq AND yyjg.TJRQ <![CDATA[>=]]>(CASE WHEN (select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ')='0' THEN (select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=cast('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER)) WHEN (select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ')='1' THEN (select nc from csb_sjw where tjrq=cast('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER)) WHEN (select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ')='2' THEN (select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=(select cast(css.csz as integer) from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJZQSRQ')) end)) AND cy.jgkhdxdh IN (SELECT jgkhdxdh FROM KHDX_JGCY CY inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.tjrq = CAST('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER) and sjw.ym BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ WHERE CY.KHDXDH = $khdxdh$) group by cy.jgkhdxdh union all select cy.jgkhdxdh as jgkhdxdh, 0 as zjx from khdx_jgcy cy inner join csb_sjw sjw2 on sjw2.tjrq = CAST('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER)and sjw2.ym BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ where cy.khdxdh = $khdxdh$) b group by b.jgkhdxdh

select coalesce(sum(a.fpjx), 0) as fpjx from sgdr_xnhyfpjx a inner join khdx_jgcy b on a.khdxdh = b.khdxdh and a.tjrq between b.qsrq and b.jsrq inner join xtb_xtcs css on css.csmc='XNHYJZQSRQ' where a.tjrq in (select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq<![CDATA[<=]]>(select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=cast('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER)) and ym=tjrq AND a.TJRQ <![CDATA[>=]]>(CASE WHEN (select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ')='0' THEN (select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=cast('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER)) WHEN (select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ')='1' THEN (select nc from csb_sjw where tjrq=cast('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER)) WHEN (select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ')='2' THEN (select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=(select cast(css.csz as integer) from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJZQSRQ')) end)) and b.jgkhdxdh in (SELECT jgkhdxdh FROM KHDX_JGCY CY inner join csb_sjw w on w.tjrq = CAST('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER) WHERE CY.KHDXDH = $khdxdh$ AND w.ym BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ) group by b.jgkhdxdh
select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ'
select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJZQSRQ'

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select $tjny$ as tjny, jx.khdxdh,jx.tjrq,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc, cast(jx.fpjx as decimal(19,2)) as fpjx, cast(COALESCE(a.yyjg,0) as decimal(19,2))as xnhyjx,jx.bzsm from sgdr_xnhyfpjx jx inner join khdx_hy hy on jx.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on hy.khdxdh=cy.khdxdh and $tjny_ym$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on cy.jgkhdxdh=jg.khdxdh left join ( select sum(yyjg) as yyjg,jg.khdxdh from khfa_yyjg_hy yyjg inner join khfa_fapz pz on yyjg.fabh = pz.fabh and pz.yyzlbh =1 inner join khdx_hy hy on yyjg.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and hy.hydh like 'XN%' inner join khdx_jgcy cy on hy.khdxdh=cy.khdxdh and $tjny_ym$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on cy.jgkhdxdh=jg.khdxdh inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.ym = yyjg.tjrq where $jzbz$ group by jg.khdxdh )a on jg.khdxdh = a.khdxdh where 1=1 and jx.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and jx.tjrq = $tjny_ym$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select $tjny$ as tjny, jx.khdxdh,jx.tjrq,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc, cast(jx.fpjx as decimal(19,2)) as fpjx, cast(COALESCE(a.yyjg,0) as decimal(19,2))as xnhyjx,jx.bzsm from sgdr_xnhyfpjx jx inner join khdx_hy hy on jx.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy cy on hy.khdxdh=cy.khdxdh and $tjny_ym$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on cy.jgkhdxdh=jg.khdxdh left join ( select sum(yyjg) as yyjg,jg.khdxdh from khfa_yyjg_hy yyjg inner join khfa_fapz pz on yyjg.fabh = pz.fabh and pz.yyzlbh =1 inner join khdx_hy hy on yyjg.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and hy.hydh like 'XN%' inner join khdx_jgcy cy on hy.khdxdh=cy.khdxdh and $tjny_ym$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on cy.jgkhdxdh=jg.khdxdh inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.ym = yyjg.tjrq where $jzbz$ group by jg.khdxdh )a on jg.khdxdh = a.khdxdh where 1=1 and jx.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and jx.tjrq = $tjny_ym$ ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select KHDXDH, BZSM, FPJX,F_TIMETOCHAR(CZSJ,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as CZSJ, CZR, TJRQ from SGDR_XNHYFPJX where 1= 1 and KHDXDH = $khdxdh$ and TJRQ = $tjrq$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select KHDXDH, BZSM, FPJX,F_TIMETOCHAR(CZSJ,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as CZSJ, CZR, TJRQ from SGDR_XNHYFPJX where 1= 1 and KHDXDH = $khdxdh$ and TJRQ = $tjrq_ym$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into SGDR_XNHYFPJX( KHDXDH, CZSJ, CZR, TJRQ, FPJX, BZSM ) values ( $khdxdh$,f_get_timestamp('$czsj$'),'$czr$',$tjrq_ym$,$fpjx$,'$bzsm$')
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update SGDR_XNHYFPJX set FPJX = $fpjx$,BZSM = '$bzsm$' where 1=1 and KHDXDH = $khdxdh$ and TJRQ = $tjrq_ym$
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from SGDR_XNHYFPJX where 1=1 and KHDXDH = $khdxdh$ and TJRQ = $tjrq$
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select coalesce(cast(css.csz as integer),0) as csrq from xtb_xtcs css where csmc='XNHYJZQSRQ'

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select 1 from ( select b.jgkhdxdh,sum(zjx) as zjx from( SELECT cy.jgkhdxdh, sum (yyjg.yyjg) AS zjx from khfa_yyjg_hy yyjg inner join khfa_fapz pz on yyjg.fabh = pz.fabh and pz.yyzlbh = 1 inner join khdx_hy hy on yyjg.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and hy.hydh like 'XN%' inner join khdx_jgcy cy on hy.khdxdh = cy.khdxdh and yyjg.tjrq between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq where yyjg.tjrq in(select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER)) AND cy.jgkhdxdh IN(SELECT jgkhdxdh FROM KHDX_JGCY CY WHERE CY.KHDXDH=$khdxdh$ AND CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER) BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ ) group by cy.jgkhdxdh union all select cy.jgkhdxdh as jgkhdxdh,0 as zjx from khdx_jgcy cy where cy.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER) BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ )b group by b.jgkhdxdh )b inner join ( select a.jgkhdxdh,sum(a.fpjx) as fpjx from( select cy.jgkhdxdh as jgkhdxdh,$fpjx$ as fpjx from khdx_jgcy cy where cy.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER) BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ union all select b.jgkhdxdh,sum(a.fpjx) as fpjx from sgdr_xnhyfpjx a inner join khdx_jgcy b on a.khdxdh=b.khdxdh and a.tjrq between b.qsrq and b.jsrq where a.tjrq in(select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER)) and b.jgkhdxdh in(SELECT jgkhdxdh FROM KHDX_JGCY CY WHERE CY.KHDXDH=$khdxdh$ AND CAST('$tjrq$'||'01' AS INTEGER) BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ) AND a.khdxdh!=$khdxdh$ group by b.jgkhdxdh )a group by a.jgkhdxdh )a on a.jgkhdxdh=b.jgkhdxdh where a.fpjx>b.zjx

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select cast(sum(zjx) as decimal(19,2)) as zjx from (SELECT cy.jgkhdxdh, sum(yyjg.yyjg) AS zjx from khfa_yyjg_hy yyjg inner join khfa_fapz pz on yyjg.fabh = pz.fabh and pz.yyzlbh = 1 inner join khdx_hy hy on yyjg.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and hy.hydh like 'XN%' inner join khdx_jgcy cy on hy.khdxdh = cy.khdxdh and yyjg.tjrq between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq INNER JOIN csb_sjw sjw ON sjw.TJRQ= cast ('$tjrq$'||'01' AS integer) inner join xtb_xtcs css on css.csmc='XNHYJZQSRQ' where yyjg.TJRQ in (select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq<=(select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=cast('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER)) and ym=tjrq AND yyjg.TJRQ >=(CASE WHEN (select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ')='0' THEN (select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=cast('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER)) WHEN (select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ')='1' THEN (select nc from csb_sjw where tjrq=cast('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER)) WHEN (select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ')='2' THEN (select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=(select cast(css.csz as integer) from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJZQSRQ')) end)) AND cy.jgkhdxdh IN (SELECT jgkhdxdh FROM KHDX_JGCY CY inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.tjrq = CAST('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER) and sjw.ym BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ WHERE CY.KHDXDH = $khdxdh$) group by cy.jgkhdxdh union all select cy.jgkhdxdh as jgkhdxdh, 0 as zjx from khdx_jgcy cy inner join csb_sjw sjw2 on sjw2.tjrq = CAST('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER)and sjw2.ym BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ where cy.khdxdh = $khdxdh$) b group by b.jgkhdxdh

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select coalesce(sum(a.fpjx), 0) as fpjx from sgdr_xnhyfpjx a inner join khdx_jgcy b on a.khdxdh = b.khdxdh and a.tjrq between b.qsrq and b.jsrq inner join xtb_xtcs css on css.csmc='XNHYJZQSRQ' where a.tjrq in (select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq<=(select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=cast('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER)) and ym=tjrq AND a.TJRQ >=(CASE WHEN (select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ')='0' THEN (select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=cast('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER)) WHEN (select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ')='1' THEN (select nc from csb_sjw where tjrq=cast('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER)) WHEN (select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ')='2' THEN (select ym from csb_sjw where tjrq=(select cast(css.csz as integer) from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJZQSRQ')) end)) and b.jgkhdxdh in (SELECT jgkhdxdh FROM KHDX_JGCY CY inner join csb_sjw w on w.tjrq = CAST('$tjrq$' || '01' AS INTEGER) WHERE CY.KHDXDH = $khdxdh$ AND w.ym BETWEEN CY.QSRQ AND CY.JSRQ) group by b.jgkhdxdh
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJZQSRQ'
